section1.description: Yay, the diagnostic test is free. Regardless of whether the garage finds a fault of not.
section1.title: Free diagnostic

section2.description: Pay the exact price shown in the app if our prediction is correct. We use only AA approved parts.
section2.title: Peace of mind

section3.description: Parts and labour are guaranteed up to 1 year or up to 12,000 miles, whichever comes first. This doesn't affect your statutory rights.
section3.title: Additional Guarantee

section4.description: Our expert mechanics can come to you, or choose free collection and drop off.
section4.title: Convenient

section5.description: We'll manage the whole process for you, even dealing with the garage on your behalf.
section5.title: Hassle free

bookingAccordion.caption_garage: Great news, the garage has confirmed your booking.
bookingAccordion.caption_mobile: Great news, your booking has been confirmed.
bookingAccordion.infoText:
Call our AA-X assist team
on 03300 530466

cancel.caption: If you need to change or cancel your booking you’ll need to ring us 24hrs before. We’re always happy to help.
cancel.infoText: Please call us. An AA-X service team member will be happy to help 0330 053 0466
cancel.title: Change or cancel booking

infoModal.caption:
Your booking has now been confirmed with the garage. Once the job is complete, we’ll call you to take payment.

Find out what to expect at your appointment in our pre visit checks section.

If you need to change or cancel your booking, please call us.
infoModal.title: What happens now?

payment.caption: We won’t take payment until the job is complete. We will phone you to process your payment.  Or if you prefer, you can call us
payment.captionTwo: If you want to cancel please call our dedicated AA-X service team.
payment.infoText:
Call our AA-X service team
member on 0330 053 0466
payment.title: Payment processing

after.caption_garage:
Always ask the garage about opening and closing hours to plan your pick up.

A receipt and price summary will be emailed to you and record will be kept in the app. This can be found in the Bookings section on your AA-X dashboard.
after.caption_mobile:
The owner of the vehicle will need to be available to collect the keys from the mechanic on completion of the repair.

A receipt and price summary will be emailed to you and record will be kept in the app. This can be found in the Bookings section on your AA-X dashboard.

before.bulletOne_garage: Make sure to drop off your vehicle first thing in the morning. And don’t forget to check your garage’s opening hours.
before.bulletOne_mobile: Make sure the vehicle is parked on a level surface with good access all around.
before.bulletThree_mobile: Please provide vehicle keys to the mechanic on arrival.
before.bulletTwo_garage: Your AA-X app dashboard will be updated with important details like the date, directions to the garage, and contact details.
before.bulletTwo_mobile: Make sure the vehicle is parked off the main road i.e. driveway/car park and that you have access permission at that location.
before.caption_garage: Some pointers on making your visit a breeze.
before.caption_mobile: A few tips to make sure the Mobile Mechanic can perform the job.

during.bulletOne_mobile: Make sure the Locking Wheel Nut Key and Service Book are left on the Passenger seat before the mechanic arrives. If they aren’t, we won’t be able to remove your wheels or stamp your service book.
during.bulletTwo_mobile: The mechanic will road test the vehicle before and after completing the work you booked- please make sure they can get in and out.
during.caption_garage:
If the garage finds new issues with your car we will always call you before carrying out any additional repairs.

We will phone you when the job is complete and to take your payment.
during.caption_mobile: If the mechanic finds new issues with your car we’ll always call you before carrying out any additional repairs.
during.captionTwo_mobile: Please provide vehicle keys to the mechanic on arrival.

estimate.caption: Pay the exact price shown in the app if our prediction is correct. We will always contact you if additional work is needed that will increase the price.
estimate.title: Estimated cost of repair

confirmGarage.dateTitle_mobile: Selected date for your mobile repair

deliveryAddress.title: Confirm collection and return address
deliveryAddress.title_mobile: Confirm your address for mobile repair

bookMot.caption: Here are the details for your MOT booking
bookMot.title: MOT Service

existingCover.section1: If you are in a breakdown situation, please refer to your AA breakdown cover and request assistance via the contact details specified in your policy documents.
existingCover.section2: If you have an existing car warranty then you should contact your warranty provider to see if you are covered for any recommended repairs before purchasing them through the AA-X App.
existingCover.title: Important info - Check your existing cover

overview.subtitle: A summary of what needs to be repaired and what we estimate it will cost.
overview.title: Your recommended repair

noGarages.subtitle: We're adding loads of garages all the time. Try entering another one nearby.
noGarages.title: Uh-oh we don't have garages for this postcode yet.

mobile.point_one: One of our roadside heroes will come to you
mobile.point_three: Stress free and no call out fee

repairOption.caption: Our place or yours? Pick a garage or choose a date for a mobile mechanic to come to you at no additional charge.
repairOption.title: Select repair option

addService.caption: Select a service you would like for your vehicle. Only one service can be added
addService.title: Add services

selectService.caption: Catered service options available for your vehicle
selectService.title: Select a service

insightRecommendation.noBasket: You have booked a repair for all recommendations
insightRecommendation.optionDescription_BATTERY: We recommend getting your battery tested at a trusted garage, they will be able to confirm whether a replacement is needed
insightRecommendation.optionDescription_ENGINE: We recommend you book into a garage immediately to confirm and repair this fault, and any other issues that may be contributing to it.
insightRecommendation.optionFooter: The price may change depending on the outcome of the garage diagnostic. Other issues may be detected.

info.title: Expect our AA-X service team member to contact you on a number like this 03300 530466

phoneContainer.subtitle: This is the number we will use to discuss your booking
phoneContainer.title: Confirm mobile contact number

paymentInfo.subtitle: We’ll contact you to take payment after your repair is completed, and the exact cost is agreed.

bookingSummary.preAuthWarning: Funds must be available at pre-authorization on the card used for booking, or your appointment could be cancelled. We accept Visa, Mastercard and debit.
bookingSummary.pricePromise: Pay the exact price shown in the app if our prediction is correct. We will always contact you if additional work is needed that will increase the price

repair.warning: We'll call up to 1 day before with your repair time slots

bookingSummary.termsAndConditions: I accept that the AA-X Repair Service will be provided to me on the date of my booking. I acknowledge that I can not cancel my contract once the services have been completed
